title: Authors and Citation
text: Jasen Finch. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Finch J (2023). construction: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications Putative Molecular Formula Assignments. R package version 0.4.2, https://jasenfinch.github.io/construction/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {construction: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications for Putative Molecular Formula Assignments},   author = {Jasen Finch},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.4.2},   url = {https://jasenfinch.github.io/construction/}, }

what: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications for Putative Molecular Formula Assignments
title: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications for Putative Molecular Formula Assignments
text: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications Putative Molecular Formula Assignments m/z Features ESI-MS

title: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications for Putative Molecular Formula Assignments
text: R package provides approach compiling consensus structural chemical classifications putative molecular formulas assigned m/z features electrospray ionisation mass spectrometry (ESI-MS) approaches. Putative ionisation products can searched KEGG compound database /PubChem identify candidate compounds. candidate compounds searched ClassyFire database consensus structural chemical classification calculated.

title: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications for Putative Molecular Formula Assignments
text: construction package can installed GitHub using following:

title: Consensus Structural Chemical Classifications for Putative Molecular Formula Assignments
text: package documentation can browsed online https://jasenfinch.github.io/construction/. believe ’ve found bug construction, please file bug (, possible, reproducible example) https://github.com/jasenfinch/construction/issues.

what: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
title: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
text: Accessor methods Consensus Construction S4 classes.

title: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
code: mf(x)  # S4 method for Consensus mf(x)  adductRules(x)  # S4 method for Consensus adductRules(x)  organism(x)  # S4 method for Consensus organism(x)  database(x)  # S4 method for Consensus database(x)  hits(x)  # S4 method for Consensus hits(x)  PIPs(x)  # S4 method for Consensus PIPs(x)  classifications(x)  # S4 method for Consensus classifications(x)  consensusClassifications(x)  # S4 method for Consensus consensusClassifications(x)  consensus(x, adduct, threshold = 66)  # S4 method for Consensus consensus(x, adduct, threshold = 66)  # S4 method for Construction classifications(x)  summariseClassifications(x)  # S4 method for Construction summariseClassifications(x)

title: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
text: x object S4  class Consensus Construction adduct ionisation adduct consensus calculated threshold percentage majority threshold consensus classification

title: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
text: character, numeric, tibble object S4 class MetaboliteDatabase, depending method used.

title: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
text: mf - Return searched molecular formula adductRules - Return tibble adduct formation rules. organism - Return KEGG organism ID. database - Return searched database. threshold - Return percentage consensus threshold structural classification selection. hits - Return MetaboliteDatabase ionisation database matched database hits. PIPs - Return putative ionisation products database hits classifications -Return structural chemical classifications database hits. consensusClassifications - Return consensus classification classifications. summariseClassifications - Return tibble summarised consensus structural classifications.

title: Accessor methods for the Consensus and Construction S4 classes — mf
code: consensus <- construct(   'C4H6O5',   organism = 'hsa') #> C4H6O5 #> Searching KEGG... #> 1 hits returned #> Retrieving classifications for 1 InChIKeys... #> ✔ BJEPYKJPYRNKOW-REOHCLBHSA-N #> 1 classifications returned  ## Return the molecular formula mf(consensus) #> [1] "C4H6O5"  ## Return the adduct formation rules adductRules(consensus) #> # A tibble: 58 × 12 #>    Name  Charge    xM   Add Nelec AddAt RemAt AddEx RemEx Rule  Default Isotopic #>    <chr>  <int> <int> <dbl> <int> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>   <int>    <dbl> #>  1 [M+3…      3     1 23.0     -3 NA    NA    Na3   NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  2 [M+H…      3     1 15.7     -3 NA    NA    Na2H  NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  3 [M+2…      3     1  8.33    -3 NA    NA    NaH2  NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  4 [M+3…      3     1  1.01    -3 NA    NA    H3    NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  5 [2M+…      2     2 28.0     -2 NA    NA    H8O3  NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  6 [M+3…      2     1 62.5     -2 NA    NA    C6H1… NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  7 [M+2…      2     1 42.0     -2 NA    NA    C4H8… NA    HBA2…       0        0 #>  8 [M+2…      2     1 23.0     -2 NA    NA    Na2   NA    HBA2…       1        0 #>  9 [M+A…      2     1 21.5     -2 NA    NA    C2H5N NA    HBA2…       0        0 #> 10 [M+H…      2     1 20.0     -2 NA    NA    KH    NA    HBA2…       1        0 #> # ℹ 48 more rows  ## Return the KEGG organism ID organism(consensus) #> [1] "hsa"  ## Return the searched database database(consensus) #> [1] "kegg"  ## Return the `MetaboliteDatabase` ionisation database of searched database  hits hits(consensus) #>  #> MetaboliteDatabase object containing 1 entries #>   ## Return the putative ionisation products PIPs(consensus) #> # A tibble: 54 × 2 #>    Adduct         ID     #>    <chr>          <chr>  #>  1 [M+3Na]3+      C00149 #>  2 [M+H+2Na]3+    C00149 #>  3 [M+2H+Na]3+    C00149 #>  4 [M+3H]3+       C00149 #>  5 [2M+3H2O+2H]2+ C00149 #>  6 [M+3ACN+2H]2+  C00149 #>  7 [M+2ACN+2H]2+  C00149 #>  8 [M+2Na]2+      C00149 #>  9 [M+ACN+2H]2+   C00149 #> 10 [M+H+K]2+      C00149 #> # ℹ 44 more rows  ## Return the structural classifications classifications(consensus) #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   ID     INCHIKEY                    kingdom           superclass class subclass #>   <chr>  <chr>                       <chr>             <chr>      <chr> <chr>    #> 1 C00149 BJEPYKJPYRNKOW-REOHCLBHSA-N Organic compounds Organic a… Hydr… Beta hy…  ## Return the consensus structural classification consensusClassifications(consensus) #> # A tibble: 220 × 6 #>    adduct         level      class                   total     n `consensus (%)` #>    <chr>          <fct>      <chr>                   <int> <int>           <dbl> #>  1 M              class      Hydroxy acids and deri…     1     1             100 #>  2 M              kingdom    Organic compounds           1     1             100 #>  3 M              subclass   Beta hydroxy acids and…     1     1             100 #>  4 M              superclass Organic acids and deri…     1     1             100 #>  5 [2M+3H2O+2H]2+ class      Hydroxy acids and deri…     1     1             100 #>  6 [2M+3H2O+2H]2+ kingdom    Organic compounds           1     1             100 #>  7 [2M+3H2O+2H]2+ subclass   Beta hydroxy acids and…     1     1             100 #>  8 [2M+3H2O+2H]2+ superclass Organic acids and deri…     1     1             100 #>  9 [2M+ACN+H]1+   class      Hydroxy acids and deri…     1     1             100 #> 10 [2M+ACN+H]1+   kingdom    Organic compounds           1     1             100 #> # ℹ 210 more rows

what: Consensus structural classifications for a molecular formula — construct
title: Consensus structural classifications for a molecular formula — construct
text: Generate consensus structural classification molecular formula.

title: Consensus structural classifications for a molecular formula — construct
code: construct(   MF,   db = c("kegg", "pubchem"),   organism = character(),   adduct_rules_table = adduct_rules(),   classyfireR_cache = NULL )

title: Consensus structural classifications for a molecular formula — construct
text: MF molecular formula search db databases search. Can either kegg pubchem. organism KEGG organism ID search. Ignored argument db includes pubchem. adduct_rules_table dataframe containing adduct formation rules. defaults mzAnnotation::adduct_rules(). classyfireR_cache file path classyfireR cache. See documentation classyfireR::get_classification details.

title: Consensus structural classifications for a molecular formula — construct
text: S4 object class Consensus.

title: Consensus structural classifications for a molecular formula — construct
code: construct('C4H6O5') #> C4H6O5 #> Searching KEGG... #> 8 hits returned #> Retrieving classifications for 7 InChIKeys... #> ✔ BJEPYKJPYRNKOW-REOHCLBHSA-N #> ✔ BJEPYKJPYRNKOW-UWTATZPHSA-N #> ✔ BJEPYKJPYRNKOW-UHFFFAOYSA-N #> ✔ SCSGVVIUUUPOOJ-GSVOUGTGSA-N #> ✔ SCSGVVIUUUPOOJ-VKHMYHEASA-N #> ✔ CODPBKJMVNZFKR-REOHCLBHSA-N #> ✔ CODPBKJMVNZFKR-UWTATZPHSA-N #> 7 classifications returned #> Consensus structural classifications #>  #> MF:			 C4H6O5  #> Adducts:		 58  #> Organism:		   #> Database:		 kegg  #> Hits:			 8  #> Classifications:	 8  #> Average PIPs:		 8  #>  #> kingdom: Organic compounds #> └─superclass: Organic acids and derivatives

what: Consensus structural classifications for putative ionisation products — construction
title: Consensus structural classifications for putative ionisation products — construction
text: Perform consensus structural classification molecular formulas assigned m/z features electrospray ionisation mass spectrometry approaches.

title: Consensus structural classifications for putative ionisation products — construction
code: construction(   x,   library_path = tempdir(),   db = "kegg",   organism = character(),   threshold = 66,   adduct_rules_table = adduct_rules(),   classyfireR_cache = NULL )  # S4 method for tbl_df construction(   x,   library_path = paste0(tempdir(), "/construction_library"),   db = "kegg",   organism = character(),   threshold = 66,   adduct_rules_table = adduct_rules(),   classyfireR_cache = NULL )  # S4 method for Assignment construction(   x,   library_path = tempdir(),   db = "kegg",   organism = character(),   threshold = 66,   classyfireR_cache = NULL )

title: Consensus structural classifications for putative ionisation products — construction
text: x molecular formulas adducts search. either tibble containing two character columns named MF Adduct S4 object class Assignment. library_path target file path classification library store consensus classification data db databases search. can either kegg /pubchem. organism KEGG organism ID. Ignored argument db set pubchem threshold percentage majority threshold consensus classification adduct_rules_table data frame containing adduct formation rules. defaults mzAnnotation::adduct_rules(). classyfireR_cache file path classyfireR cache. See documentation classyfireR::get_classification details.

title: Consensus structural classifications for putative ionisation products — construction
text: argument x tibble, tibble returned containing consensus structural classifications. argument x object S4 class Assignment, object S4 class Construction returned.

title: Consensus structural classifications for putative ionisation products — construction

title: Example structural classifications — structural_classifications

title: construction 0.4.2
text: Added “consensus” kingdom occasions consensus specified threshold reached. Ensure specified consensus threshold correctly set assessing library status.

title: construction 0.4.1
text: Increase default consensus threshold 66%.

title: construction 0.4.0
text: construct() function longer uses threshold argument. argument now used consensus() method calculates consensus calculations based provided adduct threshold arguments. construction() method now supports parallel processing using future package. search logic within construction() method streamlined improve performance. argument library_path method construction() now specifies full path construction library. Added plotSankey() method plot structural overviews Added structural_classifications example data set plotSankey() plot example.

title: construction 0.3.1
text: Remove throttling ClassyFire database queries. Added elapsed time progress bar.

title: construction 0.3.0
text: package documentation now available https://jasenfinch.github.io/construction/. Function documentation improvements. Added support caching utilities now available classyfireR caching structural classifications. Added construction() method Assignments S4 class. Added Construction S4 class, returned using construction() method Assignments S4 class. Added molecular formula search number percentage progress console output construction().

title: construction 0.2.10
text: Fixed error 0 CIDs returned Pubchem.

title: construction 0.2.9
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added Remotes field DESCRIPTION. GitHub actions now used continuous integration.
